title: The Sopranos opening credits
content:
I urgently need to identify the font used for displaying the actors' names (ie. James Gandolfini) in The Sopranos opening credits! I have searched as much as I could, but I just keep coming across the ‘Mobsters’ font.

Thank you very much for your cooperation.
